subject: Simsson Pedals Plus X
description_text:
Hello good afternoon,

I am interested for ordering the Plus x pedals. The shipment will be to
Malta, are you aware if I will pay any customs fees?

I am asking you because depending from where are you sending them, or if
you have a specific handling.
Also if such fees can be applied, maybe you ship in other major country
without custom fees? As there is a mail service to get it after to Malta,
thank you in advance.

Regards,
Manos Parcharidis

conversations.body_text: Hi Manos Parcharidis,  We will ship from China; for EU countries, we will ship from our German warehouse, and for the U.S., we will ship from our U.S. warehouse. Please note that customs duties may apply in your country.

Hello thank you for your reply,

As Malta is located in EU most probably you will send it from Germany, and
no custom fees will be applied.

Manos
Hi Manos Parcharidis,    Yes, please also note “Ship from Germany” when placing the order to avoid any mistakes.
